content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Sure, here is a function in Julia that extracts julia language code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks together: 

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md::String)
    julia_code_blocks = split(md, "\n```julia\n")
    
    if(length(julia_code_blocks) == 1)
        return ""
    end

    # if there are multiple, join them by \n
    first_part = popat!(julia_code_blocks, beginindex(julia_code_blocks))
    joined_code_blocks = join(split.(popat!(julia_code_blocks, beginindex(julia_code_blocks)), "```\n"), "\n")

    return join([first_part, joined_code_blocks], "")
end
```
